title: "Installation instructions"

EDUCE data science modules use a variety of computational tools. Most of these tools need to be downloaded and installed in order to follow along with our tutorials and complete practice assignments.

Here, you will find guided installation video tutorials for all of the tools needed in EDUCE modules including:

* Command line / Terminal
* BLAST
* R/RStudio
